sentences.en: All through the feudal ages the ruling class did their best to shackle women with Confucian ethics.
sentences.cn: 历代封建统治阶级都力图用礼教把妇女禁锢起来.

sentences.en: At the bottom of the feudal scale were the villeins or serfs.
sentences.cn: 在封建等级底层的是农奴.

sentences.en: Diplomacy was in his blood: his ancestors had been feudal lords.
sentences.cn: 他天生擅长交际：他的祖先曾是封建领主。

sentences.en: Do you still have convey a feudal idea that accepts era?
sentences.cn: 你还有传宗接代的封建思想?

sentences.en: Excellent acting all down the line captures the sound and feeling of that semi-feudal age.
sentences.cn: 全体演员的精彩表演捕捉到了那个半封建时代的声音和感觉。

sentences.en: Feudal ideas were stamped on her mind.
sentences.cn: 封建思想在她头脑中根深蒂固.

sentences.en: Feudal rulers often branded those who rebelled against them as traitors and heretics.
sentences.cn: 封建统治者常给那些反抗他们的人加上大逆不道的罪名.

sentences.en: He told him of the feudal state in which he lived.
sentences.cn: 他叙述他那胜似王侯的生活.

sentences.en: In the face of these radical challenges, the King maneuvered to avoid appearing backward or feudal.
sentences.cn: 面对这些激进派的挑战, 国王运用策略,避免显得落后或封建.

sentences.en: In the old days , she used to be bullied in the feudal family.
sentences.cn: 过去,在那个封建家庭里, 她受了不少气.

sentences.en: Many people look back with nostalgia to feudal times.
sentences.cn: 许多人留恋不舍地回顾封建时代.

sentences.en: She was beaten by the Swedish feudal lords.
The dominant genius of the " Franks " was feudal, military and romantic.
sentences.cn: “ 法兰克人 ”,突出的天才具有封建 、 好斗和浪漫的色彩.

sentences.en: The Duke's name was famous throughout the feudal world.
sentences.cn: 公爵的大名威震封建邻邦.

words.tran_cn: 使……形成封建制度；使……封建化
封建制度的；领地的；世仇的
